subject: Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals Upgrade Kit
description_text:
Hi just wondering will this work on the pro plus I have the pro plus and I
would like the easy adjustment the pro x has

conversations.body_text: Hi AkaSenT0,  The Pro Plus can only be upgraded to the PlusX kit. Due to structural limitations, it cannot be upgraded to the ProX adjustment system. However, there are some 3D-printed brackets available online that can be used to install the 8-stage hydraulic rod.

Could you send me the link for that and could I just buy the brake Pedal

On Sat, Nov 8, 2025 at 10:47 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi AkaSenT0,     These are pedals from other manufacturers for your reference.       https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/a/tickets/5812

OK, but can I buy just the brake Pedal For the pro X ultra?

On Sat, Nov 8, 2025 at 11:05 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi AkaSenT0,  The ProX Ultra brake pedal interface is not compatible with Pro Plus and PlusX control units.

OK, then I’ll buy the control box and have two control boxes

On Sat, Nov 8, 2025 at 11:07 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi AkaSenT0,  This method works as well.

OK, so can you give me a link to buy the pedal?

On Sat, Nov 8, 2025 at 11:16 PM support@simsonn.com
​  Hello, you can purchase a clutch pedal at this link and note that you wish to replace it with a brake pedal.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-prox-ultra-pedal-clutch-and-control-box

No I want the pro x ultra brake pedal can you give me a link to huy that
(not the clutch).
On Mon, Nov 10, 2025 at 1:55 AM support@simsonn.com

I made a note to replace with this the brake lmk if that’s what u were
asking me to do and u will buy it

Sorry I meant I made a note to replace the clutch with the brake let me
know if that’s is what you wanted me to do?
[image: image.png]alright done

does it come with the control box? i bought it with it i didnt know if it
came with it if it does can you cancel my order so i can re do it without
the control box?
Hi AkaSenT0,    The control box is not included. It needs to be purchased separately on the vibration motor page.

Ok then my order is fine thanks for your help the note is made to swap the
clutch for the brake.

On Tue, Nov 11, 2025 at 7:21 AM support@simsonn.com
Just to confirm you sent me the brake pedal correct?
Hi AkaSenT0,    We have arranged shipment for you. Here is your tracking link:   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047042114250

I got the pedal but there’s 2 cables coming off of it the one that plugs
into the box and some 3pin
On Fri, Nov 14, 2025 at 2:48 AM support@simsonn.com

The one thing that is kind of annoying since I’m using two different sets
of petals I can’t mess with the settings for one set without unplugging the
other because there’s no way of switching device devices in the software.
Is there a way you could implement something like that?
Hi AkaSenT0,     Currently, SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 does not support connecting multiple different control units simultaneously.
